Package surfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EditableSurface
    Interface which defines the methods for dynamically changeable surfaces.
    Labelizable
    Assigns labels to the instances of the objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClarkCell
    Cell containing various information needed for Catmull-Clark subdivision
    Clarkinator
    This class uses the Catmull-Clark subdivide algorithm to smoothen out the given models
    FVPolygonMesh
    Face-Vertex polygon Mesh which extends the abstract PolygonMesh class.
    NURBS
    This class represents NURBS surfaces in 3D space.
    ParametricSurface3D
    Abstract extension of the Surface3D class which is used for parametric surfaces.
    Point3D
    Creates 3D coordinate objects which are used as vertices in the models
    PolygonMesh
    Abstract class which is needed for all of the different Polygon Meshes.
    Spiral
    Creates a parametric surface with the mathematical functions of a spiral.
    Surface3D
    Generic class for editing surfaces in 3D.
    SurfaceUtilities
    Special pure fabrication class for spatial manipulating for surfaces.
    Tetrahedron
    Creates tetrahedron objects containing 4 points.
    Torus
    Creates a parametric surface with the mathematical functions of a Torus.
    Triangle3D
    Creates 3D triangle objects which consist out of 3 points.
    WPoint3D
    Class representing a weighted point (4D space) used for efficiently describing NURBS surfaces.
